metadata.feature_description: Handles module installation, uninstallation, and version upgrades through manifest configuration.

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > Extensions in PersonaBar
steps.actual: Extensions management page loaded with Installed Extensions tab visible

steps.action: Change filter dropdown to 'Libraries' to find Evoq.PersonaBar.UI
steps.expected: Evoq.PersonaBar.UI should appear in the Libraries list
steps.actual: Evoq.PersonaBar.UI found in Libraries list with version 10.1.1

steps.action: Click on Evoq.PersonaBar.UI to view details
steps.expected: Extension details panel should open showing package information
steps.actual: Details panel opened showing Name (Evoq.PersonaBar.UI), Version (10.01.01), Owner (DNN), Organization (DNN Corp.), URL (http://www.dnnsoftware.com), Email (support@dnnsoftware.com)

steps.action: Click on License tab in extension details
steps.actual: License tab displayed with DotNetNuke copyright notice (2002-2018 by DNN Corporation) and Accept License checkbox

steps.action: Click on Release Notes tab in extension details
steps.actual: Release Notes tab displayed with message 'There are no release notes for this version.'

steps.expected: Installation wizard should open with file upload option
steps.actual: Install Extension wizard opened showing Upload Extension Package step (1 of 5) with drag-and-drop file upload area, Cancel and Next buttons

steps.expected: List of available extensions for download/install should appear
steps.actual: Available Extensions tab showed Google Tag Manager Connector (v10.1.1) with Install and Download buttons

steps.action: Review .dnn manifest file for dependency declarations
steps.actual: Manifest file (Evoq.PersonaBar.UI.dnn) correctly declares dependencies: CoreVersion 08.00.00, ManagedPackage Dnn.PersonaBar.UI 01.00.00, and package DotNetNuke.Professional

steps.action: Review .dnn manifest file for Azure compatibility setting
steps.actual: Manifest file declares <azureCompatible>true</azureCompatible> indicating Azure compatibility is enabled

steps.action: Review .dnn manifest file for assembly declarations
steps.expected: Assembly components should be properly declared
steps.actual: Manifest file declares assembly components: Evoq.PersonaBar.UI.dll and Evoq.PersonaBar.Library.dll in bin path

observations: Fresh installation on DNN 8.0/9.0 and upgrade scenarios require deployment-level access and cannot be tested through the web UI alone
Uninstallation process requires careful consideration as it affects system stability - the UI shows edit icon but no visible delete button for core Library extensions
File cleanup verification on uninstall requires file system access and cannot be verified purely through UI
Missing dependencies testing would require modifying the installation or having an extension with unsatisfied dependencies
Evoq.PersonaBar.UI is registered as a Library type extension (not PersonaBar type), found in Settings > Extensions > Libraries
The extension uses version 10.1.1 (displayed as 10.01.01 in the UI) and is properly integrated into the DNN 10.x installation
Install/Uninstall SQL scripts are configured in the manifest for database schema management
